ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Rogues and bards (was Why didn't I log out sooner?)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I will never understand why anyone would refuse to add a rogue to a group. ... I quite agree.  The chain/fear/backstab combo is devastating to watch.  The
ygData.messageBody:
>
I will never understand why anyone would refuse to add a rogue to a group.
>

I quite agree. The chain/fear/backstab combo is devastating to watch. The
group I mentioned previously had a Rogue (hi Shadess!) and she really knows
her class. So what if she picks the pocket of the mob we're attacking from
time to time, she's got the skill so she should use it.

Rogues have been given a bad rap, much in the same way that we have over the
whole experience sham. It's a group's loss if they refuse to let one join.

-KS
